programme.title: Kim Kardashian & Pete Davidson Vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E14 The whole world witnessed Kim and Kanyes marriage fall apart. At first it seemed like they were supporting each other through their divorce, but suddenly Kanye started to publicly attack Kim, accusing her of exploiting and kidnapping their children. What happened? Our team did some digging and traced it all back to Kims performance on SNL. Everyone assumes Kanye’s attacks are because of Pete Davidson, but we uncovered the real reason Kanye turned against Kim Kardashian.

programme.title: Ariana Grande vs. Pete Davidson
programme.desc: S1:E11 What made Kanye West go to war against Pete Davidson? Kanye is relentlessly going after Pete, so much so, that Kim Kardashian is concerned about the safety of her new boyfriend. Is it because Kanye knows Pete’s history of controversial relationships? Our team got the real story behind the tabloids, the truth behind Pete’s behavior in relationships, and the journey he went on to truly start loving who he is.

programme.title: Anna Faris vs. Chris Pratt
programme.desc: S1:E6 If Chris Pratt didn’t have an affair with Jennifer Lawrence, why did he file for divorce From Anna Faris? Chris Pratt and Anna Faris were the famous, ideal couple the world couldn’t get enough of. But when Chris Pratt skyrocketed into superstardom, Anna felt more and more insecure. Then, rumors of Chris having an affair with co-star Jennifer Lawrence emerged. Even though they both deny having an affair, Chris and Annas sudden divorce, fallout of their personal lives, and the health of their son caused a media frenzy that our team got to the bottom of.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: The Rise of Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: S1:E2 Frank Shamrock was one of the toughest fighters to ever compete in the UFC. He holds the world record for the fastest consecutive knockouts, but his biggest fight happened when he was a child, living with his stepfather. His stepfather emotionally abused him so devastatingly, that even when Frank was sent to a Juvenile Detention Center, the other kids couldn’t believe what he went through. While many kids would be crushed under such pain and suffering, Frank Shamrock was determined to prove why warriors always find a way to win.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: Ramla Ali: Blow by Blow - A Life in the Ring
programme.desc: After her brother died in the Somali Civil War, Ramla Ali and her family fled to the UK in hopes of a better life. But things werent easy for the young Somali... Ramla stood out and was bullied because she was overweight and from a different culture. When her mother bought her a gym membership in order to build her confidence, Ramla tried out a boxing class and fell in love with the sport. A move that would change her life forever.

programme.title: Cynthia Vigil: Escaping The Toy-Box Killer
programme.desc: March 20th, 1999, Cynthia meets up with her friend, never expecting she is minutes away from being abducted. When she wakes up, a chilling voice speaks to her – its coming from a recording. As her tears dry up, the early memories of her tough childhood revive, and a voice in her heart tells her: escape.

programme.title: Mia Kang: The Woman That I Am
programme.desc: Overweight as a child, Mia Kang suffered bullying and a far from ideal childhood. Desperate to lose weight and feel good about herself, Mia began starving herself at the young age of 13. She lost a lot of weight very quickly and this launched her into the modeling industry which continued to destroy her self-esteem and health, until a vacation in Thailand, and her discovery of Muay Thai changed her life forever.

programme.title: Billy Monger: Unstoppable Teen
programme.desc: Billy Monger was on the track to becoming a child Formula 4 star. But days before his birthday, Billy suffered a horrendous crash that made headlines around the world and left him in critical condition. Can you imagine your own kid in the seat of a race car going up to 200 MPH?

programme.title: Katie Beers: The Girl In The Wall
programme.desc: Spaceplex is 9 year old Katie Beers’ favorite spot, before she’s abducted at that same location in December 1992, just before her birthday. For 17 days, the investigators dig into the family’s lies, each more suspicious than the next, hoping to find the lost girl. Katie is trapped in the wall, but she still has her wits, which will eventually lead to justice against her kidnappers.

programme.title: Curtis Martin: Running Towards Success
programme.desc: Legendary NFL Player Curtis Martin enjoyed great success playing for the New England Patriots and the New York Jets. After retiring, he was inducted to the Pro Football Hall of Fame…. yet he openly admits that he really didn’t want to play football and that he was forced into it. What dark trauma from his childhood almost kept him from realizing his true dream and the greatest opportunity of his life?

programme.title: Craig Scott: A Nation's Wound
programme.desc: In this bone-chilling retelling of one of the deadliest school shootings in history, Columbine survivor Craig Scott reveals the secret left by his sister who died that day.

programme.title: Tell my Story
programme.desc: Jason Reid faced every parent’s worst nightmare when his son Ryan died by suicide at the age of 14. The tragedy lit a fire in him to end teen suicide by 2030. Fathers NEED To Change NOW. In this Goalcast Original, Jason Reid and a group of fathers have an intense conversation about teen suicide. Jason shares his heartfelt story as well as crucial parenting advice that can have life-saving consequences. Witness the power of vulnerability and discover simple ways you can transform your relationship with your kids by giving them the tools to thrive in life.

programme.title: Find Your Talent
programme.desc: Tom Bilyeu, co-founder of Quest Nutrition and co-founder & CEO of Impact Theory, reveals how this shift in mindset helped him find his passion.

programme.title: What Could Be Bad: Episode 104 - An Ocean of Connection with Stephen Kellogg
Apex Fusion: Bridging the Blockchain Divide
programme.desc: Imagine a world where blockchains don’t speak different languages. Where Ethereum and Bitcoin don’t just coexist but they collaborate. In this episode we sit down with the visionary founders behind Apex Fusion, a bold layer1 project on a mission to unify the fractured blockchain universe. With a tri-chain architecture and a bridge that actually works, they are not just building tech - they are potentially laying down the infrastructure for the next evolution of web3.

programme.title: BULLISH CRYPTO REVERSAL COMING SOON XRP BTC ETH
programme.desc: Let's go ahead and talk about the potential bullish crypto reversal in progress! What do you think is going on?

programme.title: US ECONOMIC MELTDOWN PUMPING CRYPTO TO NEW HIGHS?!
programme.desc: The U.S. jobs report had a major affect on the markets this morning, but could bitcoin and crypto soar while everything else dumps?

programme.title: Navigating the Future of Finance: AI, Web3, and the Role of Stablecoins at Proof of Talk Paris 2025
programme.desc: Live from Proof of Talk Paris 2025, this episode of The Edge of Show explores the evolution of digital finance, security, and real-world blockchain utility with four visionary leaders shaping the next phase of Web3. First, we spoke with Stephan Lutz, CEO of BitMEX, who shared insights on exchange security, AI-assisted trading, and how BitMEX is navigating a more responsible approach to token listings and trader education. Next, we sat down with Nkiru Uwaje, CEO of Mansa, to learn how her team is powering cross-border payments with stablecoins and building liquidity rails for Africa, Southeast Asia, and Latin America. Then we spoke with Jason Jiang, Chief Business Officer at CertiK, who outlined how real-time monitoring and smarter compliance tools are transforming security in blockchain—and why regulators are finally catching up. Lastly, Damu Winston from Amazon Web3 joined us to discuss the convergence of Web3, AI, and spatial computing—plus a surprise appearance from his personal AI agent Samir, who gave us a glimpse into the not-so-distant future.

programme.title: Casual Style
programme.desc: Just kick back and go casual. Lifestyle blogger Caroline Hulse mixes woven and knit fabrics to make a super-stylish tunic. Fashion and sewing expert Angela Wolf restyles a classic A-line skirt to reflect today's trends. Fitting and style educator Judy Kessinger creates many top styles from just one pattern.

programme.title: Off Our Needles
programme.desc: Hold onto your needles! Tracie and Jodi, are here to dish out fresh fiber inspiration. From project picks to wooly good gossip, things are about to get super knitty… and maybe just a little nutty.

programme.title: Living Places
programme.desc: Each plant and creature has a habitat. To capture the freshness of the ocean, Jenny Barnett-Rohrs makes jars inspired by sea glass. For her art project, Candie Cooper looks to the rainforest for ideas. Then, she sponge-paints an animal foot-print rug. Jenny makes a 3-D diorama of animal habitats from paper and foam.

programme.title: Growing and Building
programme.desc: Living things inspire us to create and to craft. Jenny and Katie craft together to make a special pot decorated with glittery sea creatures. Franz takes art outdoors as he designs, lays out and plants a character image for the garden. Bloggers share great ideas for creating a cactus that won't be prickly or making a quick and easy super turtle figure. Katie shows how to create colorful greeting cards and artwork for family and friends then uses supplies in the Family Craft Box to erect buildings or make whimsical bug cars.

programme.title: Stringing Projects Using Double-drilled Beads
programme.desc: Author and designer Kristal Wick has some fabulous stringing projects featuring double drilled beads. She shows how to design coordinating necklace and bracelet using double drilled beads. Kristal also has a segment discussing metal clay. Katie shows how to store and organize seed beads.

programme.title: Metal Elements
programme.desc: Think out of the box, or maybe actually use that box as we explore the element of metal. Mary Hettmansperger creates pendants from old metal tins and assembles using cold connection techniques. Then, it's time for metal clay basics with Tammy Honaman, a very different metal medium.

programme.title: Episode 4: Technology
programme.desc: See how new machines are making their mark on your scrapbook page. Kazan Clark creates a stencil with a die cut machine and then shows how to etch on glass. Julie interviews Jenny Barnett Rohrs about how social media inspires crafting. Then, Joe Rotella uses computer software to create a snowflake Christmas ornament. Julie wraps things up with a lesson on design featuring a scrapbook page picturing family members.

programme.title: Episode 1: Your Environment
programme.desc: Shake up your art by finding ideas around your house. To start the show host Julie Fei Fan Balzer looks around her kitchen as a resource for collage papers to use for her project. Then Joe Rotella shares a new look at bats -- making a bat house for your yard. The last segment features the first of this season's color studies- the color red, with host Julie Fei Fan Balzer.

programme.title: The Midnight Quilt Show
programme.desc: Say hello to The Midnight Quilt Show, a series that celebrates late-night stitches, taking shortcuts and sewing in your PJs! Each week, host Angela Walters will bring you a quick and quippy breakdown of a brand new quilt… wine not included.

programme.title: Casper - Spooking About Africa (1957)
programme.desc: Casper is in an African jungle. He frightens a zebra at a watering hole. Wheezy the elephant has a terrible sneezing problem; he sneezes all the feathers off a peacock and a group of monkeys out of their perches. Casper decides to help, and in the process dislodges the feather that was making the elephant sneeze. But then a fire breaks out, and the elephant is unable to sneeze on command.

programme.title: Stranger in Town
programme.desc: A charming and eccentric stranger arrives in town. But why?

programme.title: FIGHTERS BALLAD
programme.desc: The story begins with a world-weary priest (Clive Russell) carrying out his mundane daily duties to a dwindling congregation. A violent, desperate man (Peter Cadwell) breaks into the church and begins a heavyweight bout of soul-searching and redemption, reflecting and refracting the anxiety and anger of contemporary society.

programme.title: LEGEND HAS IT
programme.desc: When a group of young filmmakers set out to create a documentary about the brutally horrific hutchins murders, they discover why some legend are better left alone.

programme.title: CAPTURED
programme.desc: With the term finally behind them, six medical students set aside their university worries and head off into the countryside away from the hustle and bustle of city life. However what should be a relaxing road trip soon develops into a fight for survival. Trapped in the mountains, with no contact to the outside world, they soon realise the rustle behind them is getting closer and the tingling sensation of being watched is growing ever so stronger. With escape seeming less likely, the friends are faced with the question, will they survive or is it just a matter of time before theyre Captured? A riveting tale about six friends fighting for survival in the tragic wake of a lost love.

programme.title: Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards 2017

programme.title: Interview with VJ Angelin
programme.desc: Welcome to Tele Vikatan, your one-stop destination for everything television! Get ready to immerse yourself in the captivating world of TV shows, exclusive interviews, soap opera reviews, and more. Our dedicated team is here to bring you the latest updates and behind-the-scenes insights from the exciting realm of television. Discover the thrill of your favorite television dramas as we delve into their gripping storylines and unforgettable characters. Join us as we go beyond the screen to explore the lives of your beloved TV stars through exclusive interviews, where they share their experiences, anecdotes, and behind-the-scenes stories. At Tele Vikatan, we are passionate about delivering high-quality content that caters to the diverse tastes and interests of our viewers. Whether youre a fan of heartwarming family dramas, thrilling mysteries, or gripping romance, we have something for everyone. We provide you with informative and entertaining videos that enhance your TV viewing experience. With Tele Vikatan, youll never miss a moment of the television magic.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 9
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 33
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: Dolphin Tales
programme.desc: Dunky has taken a small picnic bag and takes Keet to the lake. A nice day as by the lake very peaceful. Keet sees two dolphins in the lake and plays with them as they get friendly with each other. The prowling Cat is not too happy. And tries various antics to catch Keet with funny results. The dolphins become good friends with Keet and teach Cat a lesson to remember for a longtime

programme.title: Hill Resort
programme.desc: Dunky, Keet and Cat arrive at a nearby hill station with GrandPA for a small holiday, just in time to realize that the local monkeys are not so friendly. A mad chase follows between the monkeys and the three of them .

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: Dude's Lagoon
programme.desc: When a mermaid seeks his help because a sea monster is destroying her home, Dude has to figure out a way to stop the creature, especially when he learns its Sneevil and Biggs latest contraption.

programme.title: Marco's Garden
programme.desc: The neighboring dog Moti is very fussy about his Garden of the house and takes his job seriously to guard it.

programme.title: Down With Flu
programme.desc: Don is down with flu and his sneezes have left the mice sleepless. They take it as their sole responsibility to stop Don’s sneezes by hook or crook! From medicinal ginger tea to ringing up the doctor they try it all to stop the flu.

programme.title: HOT SEAT
programme.desc: Chai Raja finishes his super stylish chai making. Now he wants to relax for a while.So he takes out his favourite wooden chair to rest in between his cooking. But the chair has a minor problem. Its right hand is a little shaky due to a loose nut. Chai Raja instructs Sundar to fix it. Sundar happily and proudly takes it outside the shop to repair. Basha is super excited to get something to play with. It is war time for Sundar trying to save his masters favourite chair. But Basha is coming up with innovative plans to destroy the chair. In between when Chai Raja wants to sit, Sundar goes crazy finding things for his master to sit - a stack of pillows, a wooden log, over even his own back! At last all that remains of the chair is a few pieces of wooden sticks. And an exasperated Sundar gives the sticks to Chai Raja and asks him to beat him upbecause Sundar knows that it is coming anyways!

programme.title: Colour Chaos
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffel can’t decide what colour to paint the town hall as it is so dull and grey. So Deedee offers to help, without magic this time, by getting a town vote as to which colour is liked best. Deedee and Nino go ahead and do just that, asking each and everybody they see in Abra-Dabra and noting their choice of colours. Boris and Sandy are confused so set out to paint and decide, but end up messing up the wall. They seek the help of Deedee, who is all so ready to help. But Nino is scared things will get worse with the powerful magic spell, and with good reason. The spell not only “cleaned” Charlie’s wall but made grey stripes on the walls of every house in Abra-Dabra! Even Tiggy’s yellow house is all grey!! So Deedee and everybody else pitch in and paint every house back to its original colour. So the final building standing is the town hall, but no one has sufficient pain for any one colour. So they finally decide to paint it with every colour they have, like a rainbow!

programme.title: Ant Attack!
programme.desc: It is a usual day in the house with the war between the dogs and the rats. And there is a new group. In fact an army of enemies – ants! And they make the life in the house a living hell. For the first time Don , Colonel and the rat trio get a real taste of the bad ants.

programme.title: Spooktacular.
programme.desc: The gang is ‘haunted’ by a mystery spook – and sets out to overcome their collective fear and get to the bottom of the scary mystery.

programme.title: Kramazon
programme.desc: Buzz watches Miss Paige order supplies before her vacation online and have it show up the next day. Buzz tells the others and the Creepy Candy hatch a plan to go shopping while Paige is away! Watch the chaos unfold in this hilarious episode when their order is delivered and the party begins!

programme.title: Kites Away!
programme.desc: It all happens for a kite! Don wants it… the rats wont let it go. And in this tug of war, an angry and frustrated King Chomp is funnily pulled into. It is a bad time for the rats and a very bad time for Don and Colonel.

programme.title: Gummys Little Pet.
programme.desc: Gummy gets a small pet fish with a HUGE appetite – and he, Harry and Kala soon find that feeding this ever-ravenous, ever-growing pet is pretty much a full-time job!

programme.title: Shapeshifter
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: MONDO YAWN
programme.desc: Maestro Woof is having trouble sleeping. The Guardians try to cure his insomnia. The other Elders make a sleeping tonic, but Pai mistakes it for lemonade and drinks it. Xia and April discover a Mutant Raccoon from Negu is keeping Maestro Woof awake. Pai “sleep-fights” the raccoon brilliantly, but can’t do it when he’s awake. With the Elders’ help, the Guardians defeat the raccoon. Worn out, Maestro Woof falls asleep.

programme.title: Bubble Cars
programme.desc: As Deedee and Nino were wondering what Charlie got the twins for their birthday, Sandy whizzes past in a brand new pedal car. Boris got one too, but he doesn’t want his to get dirty at all. So he decides not to use it at all even though he misses all the fun Sandy is having. Mewmew and Sandy even have a race across town. Boris even declines a chance to race, but is entirely sceptical about it as he doesn’t even want a splash of mud to fall on it. He is even more worried when he sees Sandy’s car not working. Deedee tries to help by magically trying to create a bubble guard around Boris’s car, but the spell falls on Sandy’s car instead. Now no one can even touch the car, let alone repair it. Boris vouches to allow Sandy use his car as he acknowledges that it was his undoing that led to the creation of the bubble in the first place. Sandy is overjoyed and promises to be extra careful. So careful that Mewmew can even beat her by running on his ears. Deedee tells Boris to prove to Sandy that she can use the car faster, so Boris races with Mewmew and accidentally splashes mud over his face, but then is happy he does and enjoys the fun. He races so fast that he pops the bubble guard over Sandy’s car by crashing into it. Charlie sets down to fix the cars and the twins are driving them in a jiffy, giggling all the way.

programme.title: SOMETHING STINKS
programme.desc: Negu has his henchmen pump a foul green fog up to the Yan World, forcing the Elders to evacuate the Westerly Breeze. Aboard the Lord of the Wind, Pai fails to impress the Elders and gets “Rocky Rodent” – a crisis of confidence. The Elders have to pump Pai’s confidence back up so he can help Xia and April defeat the Worm Monster sent by Negu.

programme.title: Wheres Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: CAN I KEEP HER PLEASE?
programme.desc: Buzz finds a strange seed and tenderly nurtures it. The seed sprouts and blossoms into a healthy, baby plant he names Ruby. As Ruby grows, she eats more and more healthy food and becomes very large and aggressive towards the other Creepy Candy TM. Ty-Poe suggests that Ruby be moved to a different environment out in nature. Will Buzz let her go, will she go peacefully, will the other Creepy CandyTM be eaten? Watch the funny and action packed episode to find out what happens.

programme.title: A Fishy Chase
programme.desc: Something is fishy in the air! Its Don’s new pet, a Goldfish. Charly Marly and Lary are drooling in hopes of feasting it, but not till Don is there to rescue it.

programme.title: Breaking Chai
programme.desc: A holy man with quite a fan following claiming to possess magical telepathic powers turns up outside the shop. Chai Raja is more than accommodating- after all its extra business right at the doorstep and Basha is curious as the flexible Baba flaunts some acrobatic twists that Basha finds interesting. Sundar, on the other hand is too lazy and not enthusiastic about the extra crowd. The Baba is pompous and demanding- he bosses Chai Raja about . Chai Raja sees the crowding eager fans and the extra money and accommodates the demands. But Sundar is irritated by the Babas attitude and would love to get rid of him. Basha on the flipside is won over by the Baba who magically pulls out special bananas for Basha- Basha instantly teams up with the Baba. Sundar annoyed further at this partnership clumsily intervenes and instead he ends up exposing the Baba who was actually an imposter all along. Though the show is ruined, Chai Raja still grins as his shop has suddenly gone all popular and people are streaming in to see the dog that dunnit and Sundar for once, though still a server, beams as he dishes out paw-shaped fritters- his way of giving an autograph.

programme.title: Two Tickets.
programme.desc: When Gummy wins two tickets to a big dance show, each of his best pals vie to be the one he gives the coveted second ticket to.

programme.title: Coco Jumbo
programme.desc: It’s the time of the month when the coconuts from the trees have to be removed to be send the market for sale. GrandPA has entrusted Dunky to do this job.

programme.title: Friendfest Festival
programme.desc: Friendfest is about to be ruined when the Smighties get the Switcherozee Surprise from the Villains and switch personalities. They get the ultimate lesson in friendship when theyl learn to appreciate each other and defeat Sneevil and Biggs.

programme.title: HOT(H)ELL
programme.desc: Chai Raja has a wedding to attend and leaves the hotels charge in Sundars hands for the first time ever. Sundar wants to prove to his boss that he is truly capable. He is all geared up and tries everything possible to make tea in his boss style. It is tea rain all over the place with the customers cringing and getting burned. It is havoc in the teashop when Basha decides to add to Sundars agony. What follows is a mad chase. And when Chai Raja returns, what remains of his beloved eashop is just the door!!!

programme.title: Hungabunga
programme.desc: Sneevils evil plant, the hunga bunga, grows out of control and captures the Smighties. Its up to Dude and his fish friends to stop it.

programme.title: Team Awesome
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: The Dance
programme.desc: Speed and the gang discover that the Mach 6s mysterious jump capability is actually related to Time Travel. Meanwhile the Shadowy Org. is remotely using a device to affect Speeds control over the Mach 6s jumps. Speed realizes this device is what controls the cars ability to jump through time and that it could be the missing part of the Mach 6 engine. They discover that when the parts are combined, the Mach 6 will be a fully functional time machine.

programme.title: Dinner Plans
programme.desc: A free entry pass into a posh hotel! What more do Don and Colonel need! But there is competition at the house. From the door of the limousine to the hotel roof top, the rats make it impossible for Don and Colonel to enjoy this rare luck of theirs. But, when in need, they all stand together. After all, what are friends for??!!

programme.title: 52 The Zoonigames
programme.desc: Pancake is disheartened when Odessa beats him at a game, but after playing a series of games in the Zooniverse, he learns there’s something even more important than winning-or-losing. Playing games is not about winning or losing but bout having fun!

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors – the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: Mission Keet
programme.desc: Cat is frustrated that he can’t catch Keet. As he is shuffling through channels he sees ad on TV of the ‘Super Ace Parrot Catchers’ A quick call gets a snobbish Black suited cat with a briefcase Knocking on the door.

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: Imaginary Friend
programme.desc: As Gummy starts spending more and more time with his imaginary friend, Harry and Kala soon start wondering if he’s nuts – or they are!

programme.title: Neighbour Watch
programme.desc: There is a beautiful new girl in the neighbourhood. Everyone from the rat trio to Don to Colonel to King Chomp is bewitched by her. Now the place is all about wooing and flirting and fighting for the pretty betty. But there is a naughty twist in the story when a new guys lands. Who is it???

programme.title: Paint It Back
programme.desc: Odessa gets angry when her chalk drawing is ruined by a rainstorm. In the Zooniverse, she discovers that all the color has drained away, and she and the Zoonicorns must "paint" the hues back. In the process, she discovers methods to manage her anger and frustration. How to manage anger and frustration in a positive manner.

programme.title: Mango Season
programme.desc: It’s the mango season and Dunky has to guard all the mangoes so that no one will steal them. He has taken the help of Cat and Keet to guard them from Hoodie and the mean cat gang.

programme.title: Hiccups
programme.desc: A pesky case of the hiccups defies the oddest attempts at curing it – and, in fact, proves more than a little contagious!

programme.title: Bark or Bleat
programme.desc: When Gummy brings home a weird looking Goat home thinking that it is a Dog, Harry has a mad time convincing him otherwise. But what Gummy does not know is that he is in for a surprise.

programme.title: TREE TROUBLE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to help with heavy gardening, much to Xia’s dismay. Negu sends a Giant Beaver Mutant to eat the Yan’s world trees, threatening its very survival. Pai has to master cooking Slippery Jade Noodles to get the Mutant to eat something besides trees.

programme.title: King ragoo
programme.desc: Ragoo brings the twins a golden marker and they find themselves in a place where all the kids have to obey a kid king’s orders.

programme.title: Cock a Doodle Doo
programme.desc: Keet has a visiting friend from the city -the cocky Rooster. He is a Black Belt Karate champion.

programme.title: Red Rubber Ball
programme.desc: Odessa loses her beloved rubber ball and learns how to deal with loss. Loss is part of life.

programme.title: Treasured friends
programme.desc: Ragoo brings a treasure map and the twins find themselves on a desert island were they meet a Pirate with a problem.

programme.title: Kidnap Mayhem
programme.desc: One night a group of Bandits come to GrandPAs house to kidnap him. In a scheme of confusions the bandits manage the kidnap and arrive at a lonely warehouse on the outskirts of the town.

programme.title: Don In Pain
programme.desc: Don happens to eat a ‘metallic hot dog’ which gave him a bad tooth. Now he wants it removed. Colonel tries everything possible. Even the rats come to offer their ‘help’. But that tooth just refuses to leave his mouth. At last, they are at the dentist’s and it is all funny and hilarious!

programme.title: A Merry Ride
programme.desc: The giant wheel whirs like a wind mill and rolls down the hill. The merry go round is more like a shooting brigade. This amusement park has rides and games with a twist, for Don, Colonel, Charly, Marly and Lary are all geared up to have a fun-filled outing!

programme.title: The Macaroni Plant
programme.desc: Gummy is determined to grow his favourite food – even if macaroni plants don’t exist!

programme.title: Baby On Loose
programme.desc: One fine day, Don finds a baby at his doorstep. But with the rats around, it is indeed a mission for don and colonel to keep the baby safe. Will the dogs keep the baby safe? What twist could possibly happen?

programme.title: Spooktacular.
programme.desc: The gang is ‘haunted’ by a mystery spook – and sets out to overcome their collective fear and get to the bottom of the scary mystery.

programme.title: Final Attack
programme.desc: The Guardians fall out with each other and start training separately. But that very day, Negu decides to send out ALL his mutants at the same time. Xia and Pai are captured and April has to descend to the Chou World to free them. By working as a team and using the mutants’ weaknesses against them, they finally defeat them all.

programme.title: A Prodigious Nose_Based On Pinocchio
programme.desc: On this occasion, the fairytale detective SANDRA travels to the popular tale of Pinocchio, to help poor, distraught GEPPETTO. His son has once again turned into a lifeless puppet that not even the Blue Fairy can bring back to life. SANDRA and her assistant, FO, after discovering that the puppet in GEPPETTO’s house is simply an imitation, face a difficult investigation and end up discovering that the culprit is, once again, the evil STROMBOLI. This puppet master is using the innocent PINOCCHIO to commit one robbery after another, thanks to his astonishing growing nose.

programme.title: Less is More
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Eye Strain
programme.desc: The rat trio takes their plan one step ahead by fixing contact lens in Don’s eyes while he is asleep, thereby blurring his vision. Now the rats just partyyyyy and Don can’t see a thing. But when Colonel finds out the plan, the naughty rats are definitely in for a surprise.

programme.title: Music Mayhem
programme.desc: Whoever heard of Ipods short circuiting? To add to that rigged head phones, musical bombs and bombastic explosions that takes them to outer space. The brother duo gets mummified ultimately but still there is no end to this musical mayhem.

programme.title: Chill Out
programme.desc: A hot summer afternoon. The fan has stopped working and the ice trays are empty, and who could be responsible for putting Don through all this sweat! Mottu Lambu and Chottu giggle as they watch Don spinning along with the fan, getting frozen inside a locked deep freezer. Colonel is all set to rescue Don, but will he succeed?

programme.title: See The Problem
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Magic Wand
programme.desc: The van of the magician is passing by the GrandPAs house as Hoodie grabs the magicians wand unnoticed and heads towards the house.

programme.title: Treehouse Dreams
programme.desc: Odessa designs her own treehouse, but obstacles like no tree get in her way. With a little inspiration from the Zoonicorns, she still finds a way to make her dreams come true. Odessa learns to deal with setbacks in a positive way by being creative and rethinking things, then having the persistence to follow through.

programme.title: The Bigger The Lie
programme.desc: ODESSA thinks she’s gotten away with a little white lie until she visits the Zooniverse where she meets the FIBASAURUS – a tiny, fantastical creature that grows bigger and bigger with every fib that Odessa tells until it is a towering monster capable of upending the Zooniverse!. Little white lies can only grow larger and larger.

programme.title: Genie Ball
programme.desc: Genie, Aladdin and Jamillah are playing an enchanted version of football - Genie Football! The Princess can hear all the fun from inside the palace and wishes she could join in but the Grand Vizier wont let her out. She sneaks out disguised as a washer woman and is quickly hit by the enchanted football. As soon as she touches it she falls into a deep slumber. Thats what happens when Princesses mess with Genie magic. Now they need to find a prince to kiss her and wake her up before the guards find her with our gang and arrest them for kidnapping. But Jamillah remembers that Aladdin will one day become a prince and convinces him to do it. Reluctantly he does and the princess wakes just before the palace guards burst in.

programme.title: The Date
programme.desc: A date that turned into a nightmare, thanks to the rat trio. With a spring in his step, all Doggy Don wanted was a romantic and quiet date with his girlfriend. After being drenched in Chili Sauce, bathed in cement, and brushing with Dynamite, Its surprising that there was any bit of him left for the date. But Alas the trios are the rightful owners of the last laugh!

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: Fish Soup
programme.desc: Aladdin waits at the back of the line to buy fish to make fish soup for his mum. When Jamillah arrives wearing a fancy salwar kameeze Aladdin thinks she looks like a princess. Jamillah takes on the role and soon the queue is moving aside to let the great Princess to the front. Things start to go wrong when the fishmonger insists on giving Jamillah the biggest fish on his stall and Aladdin cant carry it home. He drops it in the dirt and Mustafa almost uncovers Jamillahs disguise but luckily Genie arrives just in time to save them.

programme.title: The Dung Beatle
programme.desc: To make herself more likable to the other girls at school, Fred arranges for Braianna to throw a “Pet Party,” with Friday posing as her doggy.

programme.title: GLOVE OF THE SOUTH
programme.desc: Negu is thrilled to learn there is a Glove of the South hidden on the Guardians’ island. He sends a big-eyed mutant, The Finder, to find the glove and bring it to him. The Guardians try to stop The Finder, but fail. Luckily, when Negu dons the Glove of the South, it tickles him mercilessly! The Glove of the South was a trick, invented by the Elders!

programme.title: Don In Pain
programme.desc: Don happens to eat a ‘metallic hot dog’ which gave him a bad tooth. Now he wants it removed. Colonel tries everything possible. Even the rats come to offer their ‘help’. But that tooth just refuses to leave his mouth. At last, they are at the dentist’s and it is all funny and hilarious!

programme.title: The Smighty Express
programme.desc: Creating Smighty Railroad, a secret way to the Smighty Stones, was a good idea, until the Villains found out. The Super Six must embark on a suspenseful and high-speed train race across all of Smightyland to stop Sneevil and Biggs in their locomotive from reaching the Stones first.

programme.title: Fred’s Close Shave
programme.desc: Fred wishes he could look older, so Nora would like him as much as her pop star crush “Romeo Romero.” When he learns about the hair growth bugs that made Brains grow a beard-- he purposely uses them on himself. Now, whenever Friday shaves it off their beards, they grow back longer!

programme.title: The Secret of the Fort
programme.desc: An old fort in the water is a great place for a small outing in history and Dunky is all curious to do just that. So Keet and Cat also tag along in the fort.

programme.title: Weather Boy
programme.desc: Rain keeps Fred and his buddies stuck inside, until Friday secretly clears the rain clouds, earning Fred the name, “Weather boy.” Brains warns Fred never to try that again, though Nora begs him to make her beach party have a sunny day. Fred’s tinkering attracts a strange gas cloud, which they must freeze, causing snow on the beach.

programme.title: THE TROJAN HEDGEHOG
programme.desc: The Guardians each come up with a gift for Maestra Saku’s birthday. A mysterious wooden hedgehog shows up as a gift, which proves to have Koto and Amkko inside! They attack the Magic Fort, but are thwarted by the Guardians when Xia bluffs about the dangers of his gift.

programme.title: Casa en venta
programme.desc: La familia visita por última vez su vieja cabaña antes de venderla, cuando de repente el abuelo desaparece.

programme.title: La nuera del general
programme.desc: Irina es una prometedora cirujana y una chica muy dulce. Su futura suegra está empeñada en arruinar su vida.

programme.title: La nuera del general
programme.desc: Irina es una prometedora cirujana y una chica muy dulce. Su futura suegra está empeñada en arruinar su vida.

programme.title: NTD News Today
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD News Today

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: SEHMAT
programme.desc: The story centers around a young woman named Sehmat, who is eagerly anticipating her Muklawa, a traditional Punjabi custom that marks the first meeting between a newlywed couple. Sehmat has been in love with her husband Joginder since they were married as children, and she is excited to finally be reunited with him. However, on the day of their Muklawa, Joginder, who is an army man, is called away to fight in a war. The film then follows the emotional journey of Sehmat and Joginder as they navigate the difficulties of their separation and the choices they must make in the face of war. Joginder is torn between his love for Sehmat and his duty to his country, ultimately choosing to put his country first. This decision leaves Sehmat feeling both sad and proud, as she realizes the sacrifice that Joginder has made for his country. Overall, the film appears to explore themes of love, sacrifice, and patriotism, set against the backdrop of a tumultuous and uncertain time in history.

programme.title: The Mummy Strikes 1943
programme.desc: While investigating an egyptologist's mysterious death, Superman must battle dangerous mummies.

programme.title: The Weakly Reporter 1944
programme.desc: A newsreel spoof with WWII homefront gags, including rationing, air raid drills and women filling in men's jobs.

programme.title: Fox Pop 1942
programme.desc: Hearing that silver foxes are all the rage in high society, a fox paints himself silver and gets himself trapped, finding out too late that it's only his fur anyone is interested in

programme.title: The Henpecked Rooster 1944
programme.desc: A henpecked rooster and a streetwise mouse team up to thwart the fowl's foul wife.

programme.title: Greek Mirthology 1954
programme.desc: Popeye is trying to get his nephews to eat their spinach, so he tells them about how Hercules (Popeye) defeated a bully (Bluto). Hercules gets his strength by sniffing garlic; he wins numerous tests of strength against the bully until the bully spots him sniffing garlic. The bully pulls out a handy bottle of chlorophyll and douses the garlic, disabling Hercules. He then knocks him into a field of spinach where Hercules discovers a new and better source of strength.

programme.title: Little Boy Blue 1936
programme.desc: The Big Bad Wolf stalks Little Bo Peep and steals one of her sheep. She enlists Little Boy Blue and a dancing scarecrow to assist her and her mischievous black sheep in rescuing it. Singing, dancing, hilarity and impalement ensue.

programme.title: Popeye Meets Sinbad the Sailor 1936
programme.desc: The legendary sailors Popeye and Sindbad do battle to see which one is the greatest.

programme.title: Ride Him, Bosko -1931
programme.desc: BosKo in the Wild West, tries to have fun with any situation that come in his way.

programme.title: The Draft Horse 1942
programme.desc: A farm horse tries to enlist in the army, but despite his virtuoso display of wartime histrionics, he's rejected when he flunks the physical. Dejected, he wanders into a mock battlefield, which tells him what war is really like.

programme.title: By Word of Mouse 1954
programme.desc: A foreign mouse comes to America and is amazed by its economic system. He goes to a mouse professor who explains how it works while they are being chased by Sylvester.

programme.title: The Friendly Ghost 1945
programme.desc: Depressed by the antics of the other ghosts, Casper leaves home to make friends. After unintentionally scaring several potential pals, Casper befriends two young children. They take him home, where Casper frightens their mother. Casper is again upset because he believes that he will always scare away his potential buddies. However, Casper scares away a banker who is coming to foreclose on the woman's house, and this wins her heart for Casper.

programme.title: Sinbad the Sailor 1935
programme.desc: Sinbad battles a band of pirates at sea and on a tropical isle. A giant bird rescues him, and he ends up back on his ship with the pirates' treasure

programme.title: Ancient Fistory 1953
programme.desc: It's the middle ages (sort of); Popeye is working in Bluto's Beanery. Bluto is going to the ball where Princess Olive will choose her mate. Popeye's fairy godpappy appears and it's a reverse Cinderella story, with a car created from a can of spinach.

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: Baby Buggy Bunny 1954
programme.desc: Baby-faced Finster robs a bank, but the baby carriage with the money in it goes down Bugs' rabbit hole.

programme.title: Scotty Finds a Home 1935
programme.desc: A young anthropomorphic kitten wants a pet. He happens to find a puppy with no owner and takes him in. When the Scotty tracks mud into the house, Grandma says that her grandson cannot keep him. A transient bulldog is walking by as Grandma puts a pie in the windowsill to cool. He barges into the house and terrorizes the family, demanding they feed him. Scotty rushes back to the house and saves the family, causing Grandma to decide that they can keep him after all.

programme.title: Betty Boop with Henry the Funniest Living American-1935
programme.desc: Henry, comic strip character, gets a job at Betty Boop's pet store

programme.title: Superman: Destruction Inc.-1942
programme.desc: Superman versus saboteurs at the Metropolis Munitions Plant

programme.title: Spooking About Africa 1957
programme.desc: Casper is in an African jungle. He frightens a zebra at a watering hole. Wheezy the elephant has a terrible sneezing problem; he sneezes all the feathers off a peacock and a group of monkeys out of their perches. Casper decides to help, and in the process dislodges the feather that was making the elephant sneeze. But then a fire breaks out, and the elephant is unable to sneeze on command.

programme.title: Felix Doubles for Darwin- 1924
programme.desc: A famished Felix reads an advertisement telling of a large reward for anyone that can give proof for the theory of evolution. He hurries to South Africa via Transatlantic Cable and interacts with the local animals. He angers a troop of monkeys by telling them why he's there (they're offended he would suggest they could be related to humans) and they chase him back through the cable to America

programme.title: Superman: Billion Dollar Limited-1950
programme.desc: Superman battles train robbers seeking to steal a billion dollars worth of gold.

programme.title: Felix the Ghost Breaker-1923
programme.desc: Felix is trying to get some sleep in a graveyard, but keeps getting bothered by a ghost. He follows the ghost to the house of an old farmer, and the ghost proceeds to terrorize the old man, and when the farmer calls for help from the police, the ghost terrorizes them, too. Felix, however, suspects something fishy is going on, and with the help of the farmer's donkey, gets to the bottom of things.

programme.title: The Admiral Was a Lady 1950
programme.desc: Ex-WAVE encounters four fun-loving, work-hating men, all of whom want to marry her.

programme.title: The Dentist 1932
programme.desc: An unconventional dentist deals with a variety of eccentric and difficult patients in slapstick fashion.

programme.title: Smart Alecks-1942
programme.desc: Danny comes into money for capturing an elusive criminal - money which Mugs insists he split equally with the gang while gangsters want to split open Danny.

programme.title: Back Stage-1923
programme.desc: The gang operates a donkey-propelled tour bus. Later, a cut-rate vaudeville producer hires them to help out with his show, which they wreck.

programme.title: The Jack Benny Program 1954: Season 5:Episode 5; The Life of Jack Benny
programme.desc: When Jack's studio proposes a TV special adapting the story of his life, Jack takes personal responsibility for casting the roles.

programme.title: His Favorite Pastime - 1914
programme.desc: A very plastered fella follows a pretty woman home, and proceeds to make a nuisance of himself

programme.title: Charlie Chaplin's: The Good for Nothing 1914
programme.desc: Charlie meets a couple and agrees to care for the man's crippled uncle. After the couple breaks up, the man's new girl drops some eggs, which Charlie slips on while trying to control the wheelchair. Charlie sets up the uncle near another wheelchair on a jetty, from which he lifts a beggar's cup and "invalid" sign; he places these with the uncle and money starts to roll in. Charlie takes the money and buys himself a drink. Returning, he gets to know the abandoned young woman. After pushing the uncle and his chair into the drink and battling the beggar and two policemen, one of whom arrests the uncle, Charlie beats up his rival and gets the girl

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show 1962: Season 2; Episode 5; Hustling the Hustler
programme.desc: Rob doesn't know what he's in for when he invites Buddy's charming, pool hustling brother Blackie over for dinner and a friendly game of billiards.

programme.title: The latest sports that you may have missed!
You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!

The Dude Bandit 1933
programme.desc: After Burton kills Dad Mason and makes it look like a suicide, Ace Cooper arrives to investigate. He poses as a coward during the day but at night he becomes the daring Dude Bandit.

programme.title: The Fighting Deputy- 1937
programme.desc: The Sheriff and his deputies are after Scar Adams. Scar is the brother of Alice Denton, the girl Deputy Tom plans to marry, and when the Sheriff is wounded she makes Tom refuse the job of Sheriff. But when Scar kills his father, Tom puts on the badge and takes out after him

programme.title: Loser's End-1934
programme.desc: Jack rides into trouble when he meets up with Bill Meeker and his outlaw gang. Rescued from the gang's clutches by Don carlos, he joins forces with Carlos and with the help of Lolita who learns of the gang's next raid, they go after the culprits.

programme.title: God's Gun -1976
programme.desc: A priest and his twin brother take turns defending a small town from the vicious Clayton gang

programme.title: A Distant Place
programme.desc: After settling down at a sheep ranch in Hwacheon five years ago, Jin-woo has been raising his niece Seol like his own daughter with his same-sex partner Hyun-min. One day, Jin-woo's twin sister Eun-young who is the birth mother of Seol turns up at their doorstep and insists on taking Seol with her. programme.desc: The family of Pedro, a Drug Lord, is merciless killed. The AKA El 8 looks for his brother to help him recruit the best hitmen in the region and start a deadly chase against those who murdered his loved ones.

programme.title: Immortal Kiss: Queen Of The Night
programme.desc: Queen Vampire searches for the perfect mate.

programme.title: My Little Nightmare
programme.desc: After a traumatic accident during vacation, five friends make the fatal mistake of dumping their victim's body. But exactly one year later, Someone or something is back for revenge and it's looking for more than an apology.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar expert Vikram Singh to review the iconic Don Pepin Garcia cigar. Together, they dive into its rich flavors, impeccable craftsmanship, and smooth burn, offering their insights on what makes this cigar a staple in the world of premium smokes.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: On this episode of Cigar City Unrolled, owners of Maduro UTC - Paul and Dee Dee Gray - show off their shop in University Park, Florida. Including a custom-made bar and a state-of-the-art air filtration system! Join us as we explore this unique style for a cigar lounge!

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Join host Sean Mobley as he sits down with the esteemed cigar maker, Bella Dama, offering unique insights into the meticulous art of blending and the dedication required to craft exceptional cigars. Discover the inspiration behind Bella Dama's signature creations and gain a deeper appreciation for the nuances that define a truly remarkable smoke.

programme.title: The Cigar Guys Podcast
programme.desc: The Cigar Guys team up with The Cigar Host to explore the unique world of cigar weddings. Don’t forget to comment on the video and our Instagram post for a chance to win some exclusive cigars!

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: In this episode, Ian and I will be talking about some cigar lounge etiquette. Just like any other activity, there is etiquette so that you don't offend or set the wrong tone while trying to enjoy yourself amongst others.

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: I am going to give you 7 great cigars that I can find for $7 and under but this is certainly not the final list. We would love to hear what cigars you would put on your list of 7 under $7. it was a given that the Buffalo Ten is a great cigar under $7 with as many times as we have mentioned it, so that is why it did not make this list.

programme.title: Creekside Cigar Co
programme.desc: In this episode of the Creekside Podcast, hosts Dave, Noah, and Connor react to two "top 25 cigar lists" from 2024, starting at number 10 and working their way up, all while smoking a cigar blindfolded. They discuss various cigars from the lists, including the Davidoff Grand Cru Diademas Finas, Aganorsa Anniversario Maduro, Crowned Heads Los Calaveras, My Father No. 4, Plasencia Alma Fuerte Colorado Claro, and Quesada 50th Anniversary Toro, offering their unfiltered opinions and experiences with each. The episode culminates in the reveal of their blind-smoked cigar as the Dunbarton Tobacco and Trust Red Meat Lovers (a 6x60 box-pressed porterhouse), and a lively debate about the merits of "boutique" versus well-known brands on such lists, emphasizing that personal preference in cigars means "there's no right and wrong"

programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV:
- Lanzamiento de la línea "Vitamin Shock" de CAV: Innovación para la salud capilar. - Marisel Soria presenta su nueva canción "Guiones". - Cobertura exclusiva del desfile de Adriana Constantini en el #ArgentinaFashionWeek - Cool Hunting con Rox en #Londres

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: ARI GLOBAL - LA PERIODISTA QUE TE CAMBIARÁ LA MIRADA SOBRE LOS FAMOSOS
programme.desc:
En este episodio entrevistamos a Ari Global, nacida entre el prestigioso medio de comunicación venezolano "Cisneros Media" ahora dedica su vida al periodismo, la periodista nos cuenta cómo es entrevistar a las celebridades más famosas y cuál cree que sea el secreto de su éxito. Además hablamos de su libro en donde narra en primera persona muchas de estas entrevistas.
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada JUEVES por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: MARAVILLA MARTÍNEZ - CUÁNDO SERÁ SU ÚLTIMA VEZ EN EL RING?
programme.desc:
En nuestro primer episodio hablamos con Maravilla Martínez acerca de su carrera, sus comienzos, su presente, los desafíos atravesados en el camino, las terapias alternativas como las regresiones a vidas pasadas y mucho más!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada JUEVES por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: Concierto Poético de Laura Chimaras: 6 Poemas de Amor y Vida | Música en Vivo | Memorias
STEPHANIE CARRILLO: "La maternidad transformó mi vida" | La generación del Cambio - Episodio 3
programme.desc:
En este episodio tenemos a Stefi Carrillo, quien nos comparte un testimonio conmovedor de resiliencia y lucha. Su maternidad, resultado de un tratamiento de fertilización in vitro, marcó un nuevo capítulo lleno de desafíos y alegrías. Con dos mellizas y una carrera exitosa, Stefi demuestra que con fe, apoyo y determinación, es posible equilibrar sueños profesionales y la vida personal.
Este es un llamado a todas las mujeres para que, con valentía, sigan adelante enfrentando los desafíos, se cuiden y celebren sus logros, porque, como dice Stefi, reconocer nuestro propio valor es parte esencial de ese camino. Roche nos motiva a formar parte de la Generación del Cambio.

programme.title: MELINA VICARIO: “No existe cura sin el miedo al diagnóstico” | La generación del Cambio - Episodio 4
programme.desc:
En el último episodio de Agente del Cambio, Meli Vicario nos regala una poderosa lección de vida, compartiendo su historia de lucha, esperanza y superación. Nos recuerda la importancia de escuchar nuestro cuerpo, de nunca rendirnos y de ser tenaces cuando buscamos respuestas para nuestra salud y nuestra vida.
A través de su experiencia, Meli hace un llamado a todas las personas, y nos recuerda que, aunque los diagnósticos pueden ser difíciles y los caminos inciertos, nunca debemos dejar de buscar respuestas ni permitir que nuestra voz se apague.
Roche, nos motiva a formar parte de la Generación del Cambio, un movimiento que invita a levantar la voz, compartir nuestras historias, y luchar por una atención médica más equitativa y accesible para todos.

programme.title: Guests Shane McGregor, Andre McGregor
programme.desc: In this episode of the Black Arm of the Law podcast, Dr. Rachelle Brackney speaks with Shane and Andre McGregor, co-founders of Force Metrics, a technology company focused on improving policing through data analytics. They discuss their backgrounds, the impact of George Floyd's death on their mission, and how Force Metrics aims to enhance community engagement and safety through data-driven solutions. The conversation highlights the importance of understanding social needs, transparency in policing, and the potential for technology to revolutionize law enforcement practices.

programme.desc: There's coleslaw and then there's Derek Sarno's wickedly delish SLAW!

programme.title: Vegan Cheddar? Susan Pratt Makes It!
programme.desc: This plant-based cheddar sauce is delectable and zero cholesterol!

programme.title: Preserving A Dharma Kingdom
programme.desc: In a world ripped apart by greed &violence, one nation measures Gross National Happiness!

programme.title: American Beast (aka Beast of Prey)
programme.desc: After finding an old storage locker filled with his family's history, James Erikson begins a journey to discover the truth behind a mysterious piece of land in the small town of Solitude...

programme.title: Die In One Day
programme.desc: After a failed marriage, Richard is in search of his daughter Mindy. He meets Sasha, an aspiring actress who promises to help him. But the hope to get some quick cash by performing in a 24 hours play soon turns out to be a bloody game...

programme.title: The Midnight Man
programme.desc: Hoping to fix their dysfunctional marriage, a couple travels to an isolated mountain cabin to work out their problems - but the one problem they didn't anticipate is the maniac trying to kill them...

programme.title: Alfredo
programme.desc: Brendan Cobbs, un famoso novelista, es enviado a una remota cabaña de la Inglaterra rural en busca de inspiración para su próxima novela. Cree haber encontrado su próximo tema cuando se encuentra con Alfred, un muñeco del tamaño de un niño que puede cobrar vida. Pero surgen consecuencias mortales cuando Brendan se da cuenta de que Alfred tiene intención de matar.

programme.title: Hotel Dinosaurio
programme.desc: Sienna está desesperada por ganar un gran premio en metálico en un concurso secreto clandestino, pero los dinosaurios comienzan a cazarla para entretenimiento de los ricos y adinerados. ¿Podrá ser la última en sobrevivir a la horrible noche para ganar el premio?

programme.title: Kecksburg
programme.desc: Un reportero investiga un misterioso accidente y descubre algo más que un objeto, sino una enorme conspiración gubernamental. Inspirada en los hechos reales del 9 de diciembre de 1965 y en uno de los incidentes OVNI más misteriosos de Estados Unidos...

programme.title: Cabrón y Vago
programme.desc: En esta película completa de narcos, te presentamos la historia de un hombre que se ve obligado a huir de su pueblo para salvar su vida. Pero a partir de este momento no esta dispuesto a dejarse de nadie y buscara obtener el poder necesario para regresar y cobrar su venganza.

programme.title: Apuesta con la Muerte 2
programme.desc: Tras la captura de Carrillo y de su padre, Rogelio y Emilio asumen el mando del cartel. Ahora Carrillo recobró su libertad y quiere retomar el control. En busca del poder absoluto, se desatará una guerra sin cuartel que no respetará ningún límite.

programme.title: De Apellido Pesado
programme.desc: De Misión Texas son las hermanas Carrillo, heredaron el apellido que defenderán a toda costa. El Narcotráfico es el negocio de la familia que se expande a nuevos territorios, los carteles opuestos le piensan poner un alto a las Carrillo pero se tienen que atener a las consecuencias porque ellas son De Apellido pesado,

programme.title: Bendita Calamidad
programme.desc: Los hermanos Fayos, Anselmo y Ricardo, están con el agua al cuello. Su bar no funciona, el Ayuntamiento lo clausura y se ha agotado el dinero que, para ir tirando, solicitaron a unos prestamistas que no se andan con contemplaciones a la hora de cobrar. Piden consejo a un abogado poco amigo de la ley, Antonio Orestes, que les sugiere una vía rápida para acabar con sus problemas: El secuestro exprés de un constructor de Tarazona.

programme.title: Expediente 53 3.0
programme.desc: Un extraño ser del más allá regresa con sed de venganza para acabar con todas las personas que lo han estado atormentando por todos estos años, decidiendo poseer a Jack y darle más fuerza a Baal.

programme.title: El Mariachi Gringo
programme.desc: Comedia romántica sobre un joven de la América profunda que -tras tener como improvisado maestro de guitarra a un emigrante- viaja a México huyendo de su vida tediosa y de su familia, para ejercitarse como mariachi.

programme.title: El Sonido de los Tulipanes
programme.desc: En Buenos Aires durante la crisis del 2001, Marcelo un escritor devenido en periodista, debe volver sobre los últimos pasos de su padre Tonio un consagrado intelectual de quien se encuentra profundamente distanciado cuando muere en condiciones extrañas. De la mano de Carolina la ex secretaria de su padre, Marcelo se sumerge en un mundo oscuro lleno de violencia y ambiciones de poder enfrentándose a “El Loco” Bertolini. Pero el peligro no solo lo acechará a él sino también a los suyos. ¿Podrá Marcelo encontrar los verdaderos motivos de la muerte de su padre?

programme.title: El Beso Inmortal: La Reina De La Noche
programme.desc: Las vacaciones italianas de dos universitarias chocan con un antiguo ritual. Pero a veces los rezos se convierten en cazadores.

programme.title: Distopia
programme.desc: Impulsados por antiguos planes esotéricos, poderosas elites ocultas emplean armas bioquímicas, guerra psicológica, cuarentenas mundiales, e incluso magia negra para controlar el futuro de la humanidad y alcanzar la inmortalidad

programme.title: Cutting Room
programme.desc: In “Cutting Room,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that our situation might be bigger than us, but it’s not bigger than our God.

programme.title: Now What?
programme.desc: In “Now What?,” Pastor Holly Furtick explains that the outcome of your story is determined by how you respond to the problem — so stay present and see what God does next.

programme.title: OFF MENU
programme.desc: In “OFF MENU,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that even though we might not feel ready for this season of our lives, God has already prepared us for the exact assignment that we are designed to accomplish.

programme.title: The God Of Also
programme.desc: Don’t limit your potential. In “The God Of Also,” Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us that understanding the calling God has placed on our lives also requires us to let go of the limited idea of who we believe He’s created us to be.
